content: I think Newt Gingrich ought to help our Polish friends "tackle" this issue "http://www.shortnews.com/start.cfm?id=78190" Politician Angry Over 'Gay' Elephant Acquisition Poland: Councillor Michal Grzes from the conservative Law and Justice party has lashed out at the Poznan zoo for acquiring Ninio, an elephant which appears to prefer the company of other males and is no certainty to reproduce. "We didn't pay 37 million zlotys for the largest elephant house in Europe to have a gay elephant live there. We were supposed to have a herd, but as Ninio prefers male friends over females how will he produce offspring?", said Grzes. According to the zoo head, Ninio is possibly too young to identify a clear preference. Ninio is only 10 and will not reach sexual maturity for another four years.
reply: I think Newt Gingrich ought to help our Polish friends "tackle" this issue "http://www.shortnews.com/start.cfm?id=78190" Politician Angry Over 'Gay' Elephant Acquisition Poland: Councillor Michal Grzes from the conservative Law and Justice party has lashed out at the Poznan zoo for acquiring Ninio, an elephant which appears to prefer the company of other males and is no certainty to reproduce. "We didn't pay 37 million zlotys for the largest elephant house in Europe to have a gay elephant live there. We were supposed to have a herd, but as Ninio prefers male friends over females how will he produce offspring?", said Grzes. According to the zoo head, Ninio is possibly too young to identify a clear preference. Ninio is only 10 and will not reach sexual maturity for another four years.
title: Serious conservative issues from Poland

content: Are you "special", Boots? The issue is not some kind of prejudice against the elephant because it might have the birth defect of homosexuality. The issue that Councillor Michal Grzes is pi$$ed about is that if the elephant refuses to mate, the zoo will not get the baby elephants they were hoping to make possible by purchasing this male. Gay animals are relatively worthless. But no, forget logic, you're right that the Poles are clearly intolerant of pachyf@gs and all "progressives" should be offended.
